[{'company': {'id': 18763441, 'name': 'Wageningen Centre for Development Innovation', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQENaUBdNuvJCg/company-logo_400_400/0/1613038036282?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Vj_YPFPu9agXYBsIXeRWvLjfpgBMQiairqydLd4MoKs', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/wageningen-centre-for-development-innovation/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Wageningen, Gelderland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Wageningen Centre for Development Innovation', 'description': 'Working within food systems transformation, I focus on designing and implementing projects in the horticulture sector, youth entrepreneurship/employment projects, and adult learning in horticulture capacity development programs (e.g. Training of Trainers).

My tasks include: 
•Designing and carrying out horticulture and youth entrepreneurship/employment projects
•Coordinating the Adult Learning component in horticulture capacity development programs, including designing and facilitating synchronous learning, virtual and face-to-face sessions
•Coaching trainees as they prepare to train other trainers and farmers
•Contributing to the design, organization and facilitation of WCDI short courses
•Carrying out action research (e.g. rapid sector assessments, capturing lessons learned, case studies, etc.)
•Supporting the development and writing of proposals for new projects
•Project reporting', 'title': 'Advisor in Horticulture, Youth and Adult Learning', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Cote D’Ivoire (Ivory Coast)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Wageningen Centre for Development Innovation', 'description': 'As a Young Expert, I am working on the HortiFresh program in Côte d’Ivoire. Using a demand-driven approach, HortiFresh aims to establish a more innovative, inclusive, sustainable and (internationally) competitive fruit and vegetable sector in Ghana and Côte d’Ivoire. In my capacity as a Young Expert, I focus on the following agro-economic activities:
•Support and follow-up on companies that have received co-financed innovation grants
•Support mango actors in cluster activities (i.e. value chain and market access development), addressing common issues raised by cluster actors themselves
•Liaise and facilitate capacity building activities (i.e. demonstration plots for phytosanitary products and irrigation systems; trainings on financial literacy and good agricultural practices) 
•Link stakeholders and strengthen business-to-business relationships
•Advise and support companies in accessing finance
•Liaise and support in data collection and analysis for M&E
•Organize Business Platforms, Roundtable meetings, Trade Missions and fairs', 'title': "HortiFresh Young Expert for Côte d'Ivoire", 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Wageningen', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Wageningen Centre for Development Innovation', 'description': None, 'title': 'Courses, Projects and Events Support', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 9236946, 'name': 'Young Expert Programmes', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQE6Rs6_ij3qvQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1592476509913?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=mT3wm__BlD-Dru5cx5CQIDKp45V01T99edV9-c30vcA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/young-expert-programmes/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Cote D’Ivoire (Ivory Coast)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Young Expert Programmes', 'description': 'Carried out jointly by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Netherlands Water Partnership, the Food & Business Knowledge Platform and the Netherlands Enterprise Agency (RVO), YEP Programmes offers Dutch young professionals the opportunity to acquire professional experience abroad and offers young local professionals the opportunity to take their first steps in an international work environment via Dutch organisations.
